name: slip
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: slip
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: She slipped on the ice.
example.egtrans: 她在冰上滑倒了。

example.eg: Careful you don't slip - there's water on the floor.
example.egtrans: 小心别滑倒了——地板上有水。

example.eg: The razor slipped while he was shaving and he cut himself.
example.egtrans: 他刮胡子时剃须刀一滑，把自己划伤了。

trans_examp.trans_en: to move out of the correct position

example.eg: Her hat had slipped over one eye.
example.egtrans: 她的一只眼睛被滑下的帽子盖住了。

example.eg: He could feel the rope slipping out of his grasp.
example.egtrans: 他能感觉到绳子正从他手中滑走。

dsense.name: slip
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to go somewhere or put something somewhere quickly, often so that you are not noticed
trans_examp.trans_cn: 溜走；迅速地做；悄悄地做

example.eg: Just slip out of the room while nobody's looking.
example.egtrans: 趁没人注意时溜出房间。

example.eg: She slipped between the cool cotton sheets and was soon asleep.
example.egtrans: 她钻进凉爽的棉褥单里，很快就睡着了。

example.eg: He slipped a piece of paper into my hand with his address on it.
example.egtrans: 他偷偷把一张写有他地址的纸塞到我的手里。

example.eg: If you slip the waiter some money/slip some money to the waiter he'll give you the best table.
example.egtrans: 如果你偷偷塞点钱给侍者，他会为你安排最好的位置。

dsense.name: slip
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to go into a worse state, often because of lack of control or care

example.eg: Productivity in the factory has slipped noticeably in the last year.
example.egtrans: 工厂一年来生产率显著下降。

example.eg: The schedule has started to slip (= things are happening later than planned).
example.egtrans: 日程开始推迟。

example.eg: I don't know what went wrong, I must be slipping.
example.egtrans: 我不知道哪里出了问题，我一定是退步了。

dsense.name: slip
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to get free from, leave, or escape something

example.eg: The ship slipped its moorings.
example.egtrans: 船漂离了停泊处。

dsense.name: slip
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: The dollar slipped against the Japanese yen.
example.egtrans: 美元对日元汇率下降。

name: slip
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: slip
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: a slip of paper
example.egtrans: 一张纸条

example.eg: If you want to order a book fill out the green slip.
example.egtrans: 如果想订购书，就填写那张绿色单子。

dsense.name: slip
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: She's made one or two slips - mainly spelling errors - but it's basically well written.
example.egtrans: 她犯了一两个小错误——主要是拼写错误——不过基本上写得很不错。

dsense.name: slip
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an act of falling or sliding

example.eg: One slip meant a long tumble to the rocks below.
example.egtrans: 一旦滑倒就意味着一路摔滚到下面的石头上。

dsense.name: slip
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an occasion when something becomes worse

example.eg: A slip in the value of the U.S. dollar helped push prices higher.
example.egtrans: 美元下跌推高了价格。

example.eg: a slip in standards
example.egtrans: 水平下跌

dsense.name: slip
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a piece of underwear for a woman or girl that is like a dress or skirt

dsense.name: slip
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a place where a boat or ship can be parked, between two piers
trans_examp.trans_cn: 两座码头之间可停船的水面

dsense.name: slip
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: small and thin, usually because of being young

example.eg: I knew her when she was a slip of a girl.
example.egtrans: 她还是个小女孩的时候我就认识她了。

dsense.name: slip
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to escape from someone who is following or chasing you
